title: bandham viTTAlE
sahitya:
bandham viTTAlE sukhamE adilE sikki pAzhAgAdE ahamE


anupallavi

  endenda uravinar sondam koNDADinAlum tantramAi avar tannalam sAdhippAr


caraNam 1    jAti muraigaLait-tangattAl aLappArgaL saliyAdu koDuttAlum ozhiyAdu kETpArgaL
vEda shAstram ellAm vIdikku sholluvAr vITTilE sanmArga vidhigaLai kolluvAr
    caraNam 2    veLLi naTamADinAl veNNaghai kATTuvAr verum kaiyaik-kaNDadum viraindu kambi nITTuvAr
kaLLak-kumbiDu pOTTuk-kAryam sAdhippAr kaNDAl kAmAKSi nAyakkan kathaiyai AmOdippAr
